meanings.definition: The act of winding or turning around something.
meanings.sent1: The circumvolutions of the river around the mountain were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: I watched the circumvolutions of the dancer's ribbon during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful circumvolutions around the chair made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts took unexpected circumvolutions, leading to a brilliant idea.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the intricate circumvolutions of a spiral staircase.

meanings.definition: A complex or intricate process or series of events.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the circumvolutions of the legal system can be challenging.
meanings.sent2: The circumvolutions of bureaucracy can sometimes slow down progress.
meanings.sent3: The circumvolutions of planning a surprise party kept her on her toes.
meanings.sent4: The circumvolutions of fate brought them together in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The circumvolutions of history continue to shape our present.
